title: Agent Teams Research Preview
description: Introduced Agent Teams feature alongside Claude Opus 4.6, enabling multiple Claude Code agents to collaborate on tasks. Also released Claude Code v2.1.26-30 with 6 new features, 7 improvements, and 12 bug fixes within 5 days.

community_feedback.quote: Orchestrate teams of Claude Code sessions - HN discussion with 395 upvotes
Sixteen Claude AI agents working together created a new C compiler in $20,000 experiment
Hacker News lit up with discussions about Agent Skills and Agent Teams

title: Composer Feature and Agent Usage Increases
description: Released Cursor 2.4.36 with new Composer functionality, increased agent usage limits on individual plans, improved context management for agent workflows, and quality-of-life editor fixes.

community_feedback.quote: Since today on Feb 12 2026, Cursor is not giving good results... Composer 1.5 performed worse and failed to fix issues multiple times
Switching from auto to Opus model fixed the issue on the first try
Fixing basic features before adding new ones - community feedback request

title: Agent Skills Support and JetBrains Improvements
description: Introduced Agent Skills support in preview for JetBrains IDEs, added Copilot memories feature in Visual Studio 2026 18.3.0, and implemented AI-powered vulnerability fixes. Also enhanced Copilot CLI with token-by-token streaming and memory footprint improvements.

community_feedback.quote: What's going on with GitHub Copilot in Rider? Lately, it has become completely unusable. Suggestions are missing or plain incorrect.
GitHub Copilot CLI criticism about being completely unusable due to not following configuration files
GPT-5.3-Codex is now generally available for GitHub Copilot

title: Codemaps Beta and MCP Panel Fixes
description: Released Windsurf 1.2.6 with patch fixes for custom MCP servers not displaying correctly, improvements to beta Codemaps feature, added Plan Mode support for Skills, and various bug fixes. Also released JetBrains plugin version 2.12.5 with settings sync between Cascade and the plugin.

community_feedback.quote: Windsurf is actually great... Codemaps will help you connect two features, but they are not a one size fits all. Including 6 codemaps in a single prompt is a waste of time
Tried windsurf and the beginning was amazing, last few days I start realizing that is getting annoyingly stupid and slow
The Codemaps feature provides visual diagrams that help you understand complex codebases quickly

title: February 2026 Platform Improvements
description: Released minor bug fixes and performance improvements across the platform on February 3, 2026. Cognition also expanded to Europe with a new London office and added Agent Trace support.

community_feedback.quote: Cognition expanded to Europe with a London office
Agent Trace support added (joining Cursor, Cloudflare, and Vercel)

title: Agent Skills Feature and WSL Shell Fix
description: Added new Agent Skills feature merged in PR, fixed WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) shell selection issue, and enabled additional instructions when starting an agent in January 2026.

title: Concurrent Shell Commands and GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark
description: Added concurrent shell commands capability, interactive status line configuration, sortable TUI resume picker, new app-server APIs, and GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark research preview with 1000+ tokens/second performance. Also deprecated chat/completions API support with warnings.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.3-Codex is now generally available for GitHub Copilot

title: v0.28.0 - Extension Settings and Background Shell Commands
description: Released v0.28.0 with extension settings and themes, background shell commands using Ctrl+B, /prompt-suggest command, enhanced hooks, and better authentication. Previous v0.27.0 release added cleaner terminal experience by removing input prompt box border.
